title: Michael Woods: Remco Evenepoel, Tadej Pogačar Have Raised the Bar
content:
The 37-year-old has found new fame in Canada since his Tour de France stage win, eyeing up potential retirement in 2025 or 2026.

Read the full article at Michael Woods: Remco Evenepoel, Tadej Pogačar Have Raised the Bar on Velo.
